element.name: Pascal
element.short: Bitmap, defines "Pascal" ( 1 - Pixel , 0 - empty) 16*4 Pixel (the l is the first row of the P)

element.name: StrIdx
element.short: StrIdx xored with pascal) gives the String to Display 7*2 bit

element.name: CharIdx
element.short: Charindex for all 4*7 to the Power of 5
